channel.title: MITB, help me find this game
channel.description:
Ok. It was a flash game I played a while ago, you designed this little blob character and then sent it flying into the sky. Eventually it would come crashing back down.
That's all I can remember about it, but it was really fun. Anyone know what it was? I'm desperate here.

item.title: MITB, help me find this game
item.dc:creator: @dragonfire455 dragonfire455
item.description:

[quote="``jason, post:18, topic:189745"][quote author=Carson link=topic=252678.msg2146620#msg2146620 date=1206884587]
Google.com?
[/quote]
Fuck off?[/quote]^^ Epic fail

Read full topic

I don’t think it had bubble or blob, etc. in the name…

item.title: MITB, help me find this game
item.dc:creator: @VB7_Rocks VB7 Rocks
item.description:
@VB7_Rocks wrote:

[quote=“Casey., post:7, topic:189745”]http://www.trevorvanmeter.com/flyguy/

Maybe?
Justz a help.[/quote]

Lol, nice find, but it wasn’t it :(.

TheBeanie:

Oh do you get different weapons and stuff? like you go into arcade mode and everytime you press space an anemy comes…

No, you basically flung the blob upwards and tried to get the blob to land on bouncy things to keep going as high as it could get. Controls were with the arrow keys I think…

item.title: MITB, help me find this game
item.dc:creator: @VB7_Rocks VB7 Rocks
item.description:
@VB7_Rocks wrote:

[quote=“Uriko, post:3, topic:189745”]Couldnt find it.. youre description isn`t great.

Found this tho: http://www.chinamallonline.net/games/gamedetail.cfm?categoryid=4&gameid=47[/quote]

Eh, not the same game. Thanks for trying to help, though.

Sorry about the description. I’ll elaborate some more.

It was a flash game where you had a character design thing, king of like a “dress-up” thing with these blob-like characters, and then after that you got to send them flying up into the sky to see how far you could get them.

That’s all I can really remember about it, I doubt anyone would know it unless they’ve played it. It was fun, though, and I can’t find it.

Read full topic
